title: Trump vowed to make the world safer - has he?
description: Chief international correspondent Lyse Doucet assesses the US president's pledge to be a peacemaker.
content:
Lyse DoucetChief international correspondent, BBC News
When Donald Trump was sworn in as US president for a second time in January, he made a promise. "My proudest legacy will be that of a peacemake… [+7102 chars]
